questions.question: What is the dominant color of the displayed item?
What appears to be the primary material of the product's construction?

How many visible compartments or pockets does the item possess?

What is the visible appearance of the stitching or seams?

Does the item's surface seem glossy, matte, or something else?
Does the product appear to have any visible hardware or metal components?
In terms of thickness, how would you describe the product?

What is the visible state of the interior lining of the product?
